author: marioevz
content:
Release v1.0.2 for the execution spec tests containing 4788 v2 is now out! https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/v1.0.2

Contains 4788 v2 Blockchain JSON Tests with the considerations listed in the release page.

We will be updating hivecancun web page in the following hours to run these fixtures, so the failure/pass rate might go up due to this.

Please let us know if you find any issues running these tests! ðŸ™Œ

author: marioevz
content: https://hivecancun.ethdevops.io/ is now live with the new v1.0.2 fixtures containing 4788v2, and most of Cancun tests should still pass, but all tests that call the Beacon Root pre-deploy will fail, mainly because of the gas usage on the call, since we are not using a pre-compile with fixed gas anymore, and also there are new tests that use access lists when calling the beacon roots contract
